tasks.label: Colcon: Step 1 Utilities
args: source /opt/ros/jazzy/setup.bash && colcon build --packages-select cmake_utils pose_utils quadrotor_msgs uav_utils poscmd_2_odom waypoint_generator odom_visualization map_generator so3_disturbance_generator swarmtal_msgs --symlink-install --cmake-args -DENABLE_CUDA=ON -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo

tasks.label: Colcon: Step 2 Core Planning
args: source /opt/ros/jazzy/setup.bash && colcon build --packages-select bspline poly_traj path_searching bspline_opt plan_env traj_utils active_perception lkh_tsp_solver --symlink-install --cmake-args -DENABLE_CUDA=ON -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo

tasks.label: Colcon: Step 4 Simulator & Controllers
args: source /opt/ros/jazzy/setup.bash && colcon build --packages-select so3_control mppi_control so3_quadrotor_simulator local_sensing_node multi_map_server --symlink-install --cmake-args -DENABLE_CUDA=ON -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo

tasks.label: Run: Fuel Exploration (SO3)
args: source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch plan_bringup fuel_pipeline.launch.py exploration:=true controller_type:=so3

tasks.label: Run: Fuel Exploration (MPPI_ACC)
args: source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch plan_bringup fuel_pipeline.launch.py exploration:=true controller_type:=mppi_acc

tasks.label: Run: Fuel Exploration (MPPI_TQ)
args: source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch plan_bringup fuel_pipeline.launch.py exploration:=true controller_type:=mppi_tq

tasks.label: Run: Fuel Manual (SO3)
args: source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch plan_bringup fuel_pipeline.launch.py exploration:=false controller_type:=so3

tasks.label: Run: Fuel Manual (MPPI_ACC)
args: source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch plan_bringup fuel_pipeline.launch.py exploration:=false controller_type:=mppi_acc

tasks.label: Run: Fuel Manual (MPPI_TQ)
args: source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch plan_bringup fuel_pipeline.launch.py exploration:=false controller_type:=mppi_tq

tasks.label: Run: Office Exploration (SO3)
args: source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch plan_bringup fuel_pipeline.launch.py exploration:=true controller_type:=so3 world:=office init_x:=0.0 init_y:=0.0 init_z:=1.0

tasks.label: Run: Office Exploration (MPPI_ACC)
args: source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch plan_bringup fuel_pipeline.launch.py exploration:=true controller_type:=mppi_acc world:=office init_x:=0.0 init_y:=0.0 init_z:=1.0

tasks.label: Run: Office Exploration (MPPI_TQ)
args: source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch plan_bringup fuel_pipeline.launch.py exploration:=true controller_type:=mppi_tq world:=office init_x:=0.0 init_y:=0.0 init_z:=1.0

args: source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch plan_bringup fuel_pipeline.launch.py exploration:=false controller_type:=so3 world:=office init_x:=0.0 init_y:=0.0 init_z:=1.0

args: source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch plan_bringup fuel_pipeline.launch.py exploration:=false controller_type:=mppi_acc world:=office init_x:=0.0 init_y:=0.0 init_z:=1.0
